Regalii | Remote in Canada or SF | Ruby Developers

Regalii is a platform that allows immigrants to pay their family’s bills anywhere in the world. Regalii graduated from Y-Combinator’s class of 2013 and our investors include Andreessen Horowitz, Winklevoss Capital, Alexis Ohanian, Kapoor Capital, Maverick Capital, among others.

We are now used by 18 leading remittance partners in the U.S., representing over 40,000 locations to allow their customers to pay bills anywhere in the world.

We're looking for smart and passionate people to join us, mostly on the technical side. If any of this sounds interesting, please drop our CTO a line (naysawn at regalii . com) just to say hello.

More info at https://www.regalii.com/company
